name: Enable Avalara Utility
description: Activate the core Avalara tax calculation service for your storefront.

name: Import Metadata
description: Download and import the latest tax codes and product classifications from Avalara.

name: Assign Roles
description: Grant appropriate user roles (e.g., Tax Administrator) access to the Avalara configuration panel.

name: Configure Tax
description: Define jurisdiction settings, company codes, and default tax behaviors for your regions.

name: Activate Connection
description: Finalize and test the connection between your Commerce store and the external Avalara service.
